name: Spikes Are Dangerous
description:
A slime, a bubble, and lots of blood!

Control your slime through a counter-intuitive movement system while trying to get from the start of the level to it's finish. Even doing a simple turn can be challenging. Also, beware of the spikes, they are dangerous, touch one and you die.

Die, and go back to the start to the level...

..to try again...

..and again...

..and again...

..until you die one more time.

And then succeed!
